titleStmt.title: The last speeches and confessions of Captain Thomas Walcott, John Rowse and William Hone, joyner, at the common place of execution on Friday the 20th of this present July, 1683 : who were all found guilty of high-treason for conspiring the death of His Sacred Majesty and his royal brother James, Duke of York.
titleStmt.author: Walcot, Thomas, d. 1683.
Rouse, John, d. 1683.
Hone, William, d. 1683.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
